name: Tinted Oleo-Serum
about: What it is: A tinted serum that brightens your complexion and effectively cares for your skin with nourishing and hydrating ingredients...Skin Type: Normal and Dry..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hazelnut: Nourishes and protects skin from dehydration..- Jojoba: Nourishes skin without leaving a greasy residue...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, oxybenzone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It also comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with 98 percent natural ingredients and an 80 percent skincare formula, Clarins’s first tinted skincare serum combines unique mineral pigments with the power of nourishing, dry plant oils (hazelnut and jojoba). Added ceramides support your skin's barrier function and protect against dehydration...Clinical Results:.In a self-assessment of 105 women, after 1 day of use, results showed:.- +48% skin radiance after application..In a self-assessment of 103 women, after 14 days of use:.- +41% in nourishment and comfort on bare skin.- +56% brightness on bare skin
ingredients: -Hazelnut: Nourishes and protects skin from dehydration..-Jojoba: Nourishes skin without leaving a greasy residue...Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Squalane, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Corylus Avellana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Silica, CI 77492/Iron Oxides, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Aluminum Hydroxide, CI 77491/Iron Oxides, Propylene Carbonate, CI 77499/Iron Oxides, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Ceramide NP, Lysine, Magnesium Chloride, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Application can be adjusted according to the intensity and coverage desired. Use two drops for a natural-, healthy-looking glow. Use three drops for an even, glowy complexion. Use four drops or more for greater coverage. .-Ideally, use a brush to apply, sweeping outward, or use a small wet sponge with light taps.

reviews.review_title: Dried out my skin in patches.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially loved this product so much I gave one to a friend. After using it for a week I noticed dry skin and it settling in the fine wrinkles under my eyes. I tried using it with and without primer, with extra moisturizers, post sexfoliation, nothing worked.

I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. Despite the product was small, a little really goes a long way. I use this dail during make up and it last all day. This works perfextly for covering blamishes and i will definately be buying this.

reviews.review_text: Received a sample 2.5 and 3 tint. I really enjoyed that it was a tinted serum . It left the face feel hydrated and bright . It left a nice tint like a glow its perfect to put right before your foundation. It’s also nice for a natural look .  #topbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had gotten a sample of this serum and I was so surprised by the coverage! As someone with oily skin I generally don't veer toward serums but I'm so glad I could try this out- I was left with a beautiful satin finish that didn't look greasy and held up better than some of my foundations. That being said, I do think this product might have broken me out.   I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tinted serum has a nice light fragrance. Color # 3 was a little too dark for my light neutral complexion. Furthermore, the serum settled into my large pores and made them more visible. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love tinted products but this one just isn’t for me. I tried shades 4 and 5 both with and without applying a moisturizer first. On me it looked like a powder foundation finish, and it really highlighted any drier patches of skin. I tried applying with my fingers to warm the serum and with a brush. I didn’t like how it spread and personally found it hard to build coverage because it just streaked and took too long to set.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_title: Very, natural, fresh look to the skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this tinted serum 3 days in a row. Not long enough t see any skin health benifits but enough to rate the product colour and coverage. It's quite light but very hydrating. Great for a normal to dry skin. It doesn't settle into fine lines and wrinkles. Being almost 50 means I have a couple  and I don't want to define them. I like the color and how it vlended with my skin. My powder cosmetics really got locked in when I applied them on top of this colour base. I still applied a touch of powder to set and it was a nice natural finish. If you want a glass finish, use cream colours and no powder. If you want to tone down the shine without using a pwdder, let the makeup set for a few minutes and then pat with oil control papers or one sheet of facial tissue to soak up the moisture. Gives a very nice satin finish. I would purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.Clarins' tinted moisturizer is a game-changer. It's super hydrating and gives your skin that perfect glow. It feels light, like you're not wearing anything, but still smooths out your complexion. It's will be my everyday go-to for looking fresh and natural once i fine the perfect match for my skin tone but apart from that i totally recommend for an easy, polished look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I immediately wanted to buy this product because it suits me so much.I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. I was given the shade 6 and 8 to try. Number 8 was too dark for me and number 6 was ok for my skin tone.  It was easy to apply and blends well.  But it did pile when I tried to put face powder on.  When I tried it again, I waited a good 15 mins before I applied face powder and it did not pile. It gave me a good dewy finish.  I liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this sample from topbox circle and I have to say it is absolutely amazing highly recommend I felt like I wasn’t wearing anything and it felt great on my skin, very smooth and light weight highly try it!!

reviews.review_text: I got shades 5 and 6, i would say shade 5 matches me just fine. The texture of this serum is very light and smooth. It didn’t feel like a makeup product but more like a skincare serum. It has good coverage and settles into a dewy finish which is great for dry skin people. I would give it a try some more times to decide if i want to replace my foundation with this one. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this tinted serum for it's ability to blend into my skin well and not leave embarassing noticeable blotches all over my face while still leaving nice colour. Product is smooth and not heavy feeling on your skin nor does it feel overly chemically and oily. I like the way it makes my face look and feel after wearing this all day. My face actually feels replenished and refreshed after a day at the office and I'm still glowing by day's end!   I recieved this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell was very nice.. It glided on my skin and felt lightweight.  However, even after  blending it well and waiting 15 minutes, it still hadn't been absorbed  into my skin. The coverage was light and patchy. The shade 3 made my face look orange.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #free product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for testing from topbox! I really love using serums so I was glad I was able to test out a Serum that I could incorporate into my makeup routine. Clarins is one of my favourite brands and this did not disappoint. The colour matched me well and my skin felt very moisturized and refreshed. I used it under my foundation for additional coverage and I felt that it helped my makeup last better for the day. Definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_title: Enjoyable & fresh for casual daytime use.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was given shade 4 which was an oddly perfect match for my nc35-37 skintone. It’s runnier than other tinted products and glides on very easily. Worked well with fingers but buffed out beautifully with a brush. I like medium-buildable foundations and this has medium coverage which I was not expecting! It’s marketed as a serum but finishes like a dewy oil-based foundation. If using this alone, (or under makeup) you’ll have to set it with powder as the slightly oily texture would let it transfer or settle into fine lines. I tried it in the evening time and noticed the pigments have a velvety finish so make sure you exfoliate well. The fresh cucumber scent is fantastic!  I loved the experience of it but would probably only use it in daytime where I want a quick dewy base for popping out, not in evenings or events where my skin needs to look snatched, as it highlighted my dry areas a bit in harsher lights.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. As per my review to shade 1 as well, the product worked great on my skin.  It has a very breathable texture with a natural, radiant finish. It doesn't weigh the skin down or give it a cakey appearance. My skin felt great even after hours of wearing the Clarins Tinted Oleo-Serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. The Clarins Tinted Oleo-Serum has a nice, glowy lasting finish. The texture was comfortable on my skin and didn't make my skin look cakey. The coverage was more natural and breathable. I don't like my foundation too dark compared to my natural skin tone so the shade was great. I could also use it for concealer as well on days where I don't want to wear foundation. I gave it 4 stars because although it worked well, it doesn't compare to the tinted serum I already use. Thank you, TopBoxCircle for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Goes on smoothly, I could barely tell I had anything on my face. Great coverage! Would definitely purchase this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #tryitwithtopbox in exchange for my honest review. I don’t love using heavy foundations and much prefer tinted moisturizers and skin tints, so was excited to try this product. It’s pretty good but I found it can get oily, which isn’t uncommon for this type of product but isn’t what I’m looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose shades 2,5 and 3 to try. I have oily and dehydrated skin, I liked the consistency of the product. The application was very easy with a not velvety finish and the coverage not so good for me. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_title: A must have before my makeup!!!!

reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of shade 2.5 and 3 in tinted oleo-serum from topbox circle. I never used this serum before but it matched my skin wonderfully and I'll be sad when my sample runs out lol.

reviews.review_text: I used this product for exactly one day. Unfortunately, it was far too light for my skin tone. When I did try it however, I did like how smooth it was. It spread evenly and blended well. Had I received the correct colour shade, I would have a more positive experience.and I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. I love how it leaves my skin with an extra glow. I especially love how it offered a natural even touch to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received shades 4 and 5 to test and found this to be pretty good. It is a serum so the consistency was a bit more watery than a typical foundation. I found that this didn't affect coverage too much though. I think that if someone was looking for fuller coverage, this is not the ideal product. I found the staying power to be pretty good and the light scent wasn't overpowering. Make up went on smoothly on top of the product and it looked pretty natural. I did like the product and would be interested in trying it for a longer period to time. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did like this product overall, especially for a casual day use when you don't want to use foundation. I have dehydrated oily skin. I applied 2-3 drops with my fingers. Application was very easy, it blended well, with a velvet finish.   Coverture light natural. Blended well with the sunscreen after. However, it deposited a little on the fine lines around my mouth and nose, and I didn't feel it as hydrating as expected.I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Clarins Tinted Oleo-Serum Jojoba Hazelnut in Shade 2.5 and 3. This was my first time using a tinted serum as I am more of a tinted moisturizer girl and it didn't disappoint! The serum provided a nice natural coverage that evened out my skin tone without breaking me out or making my skin look dry due to its lightweight formula. I used this product during the day and enjoyed how smooth and hydrating it made my skin feel and look. Shade 2.5 was more my shade compared to 3 but both are doable. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: The Clarins Tinted Oleo-Serum 8 is a game-changer for skincare enthusiasts. Its lightweight formula effortlessly blends into the skin, leaving a natural, radiant glow. The tint provides light coverage, perfect for evening out complexion imperfections. Infused with nourishing oils, it keeps the skin hydrated throughout the day. A must-have for anyone seeking a luminous, healthy-looking complexion.I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

However, this product being labelled as a serum when it is a oil based foundation is a bit misleading. I found it to be heavier than I expected with the label it carries as well.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_title: Not what I expected labelled as a serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Being labelled a serum, I expected this product to be light and not as heavy or oil based like it was.  Coverage was great and it blended well but, I felt this product is just a oil based liquid foundation. Not a serum at all in my opinion.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sampled this product i do love it and it left my skin feeling silky smooth i did apply it in the morning with my morning routine.  The only issue i have with it is the cost it is great but doesnt really stand apart from other products that are more cost effective  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: such a game changer, definitely need to add this to your make up routine if you haven't already. made my face look silky smooth and it blended in so well. 10/10 in my books.I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is good and felt nice on my skin but the shades I received as a sample were not the correct colour for my skin tone, I would apply it in the morning during my morning routine.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes
